message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  But remember, inflation will eat away at our gains, so we should aim for a quick resolution!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to give it all away. Let's meet in the middle and then adjust for inflation.
I appreciate you trying to meet in the middle. I'll take 70% this round, since the inflation has hit you harder than me.  Let's make a deal before we both lose more money!
I'm not willing to give up too much more. I'll give you a bigger share this time, but I'm still trying to protect my gains from the inflation.
